WRITING.TITLE: Regarding breakdowns and such, are they worth it?
WRITING.TEXT:
I normally only have support like Larsa who throws down full break for the medals but otherwise ignore breakdowns. However with the increase of bosses who disregard resistance and defense in their attacks I wonder if it's worth to pile breakdowns at the cost of less damage over all from your team. I understand the whole ID system where a mentle breakdown won't stack with a SB that only shreds resistance.
TLDR: 1. Are multiple breakdowns worth it if you do somewhat less DPS overall.
2.Is it viable to have 3 supports/dancers/thieves on your team grabbing penta-break, full break, and the others, 1 healer, 1 main DPS.

WRITING.TITLE: [CA] if someone with poor insurance creates an expensive accident that goes over liability what recourse should the people who's cars were wrecked commit to?
WRITING.TEXT:
Back ground information:
CA, Sacramento. On a high way a 10 car collision was caused by one driver. Driver is at fault after a long insurance investigation. Driver was driving a crappy car and looked on the poor side. Ambulance was called but no one was thankfully injured so it drove away empty.
Insurance:
The guy who caused this has Infinity Insurance Co. and $10,000 liability. Since 2 of the cars in the accident from my perspective were completely totaled and towed away and the extensive damage on the rest, I assume damages will exceed $10,000 by a large margin.
What should the innocent people who were in the accident do to recoup losses?
